content:
Since July 2023, the enemy has used more than 880 drones-Kamikadze and more than 170 missiles on the port infrastructure of Odesa region.

About thisstatedVCommander of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Viecadmiral Alexei Shepap during the visit of President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky and the premiere of Greece Kiriakos Kharokotakis to the Odessa Maritime Trade Port.

Viceadmiral emphasized that the forces of Ukraine forced Russian ships to leave the northwestern part of the sea.

In addition, thanks to the Air Force Air Force, since December 2023, the aggressor suspended remote mine from the aircraft of approaching channels to Ukrainian ports.

As reported by the Army in Odessa PresidentHeardBriefing of the military command on the security situation.
title: Alexei Zhpapa told how many drones and rockets have released the Russian Federation on the ports of Odesa region since July 2023
description: This was stated by the Commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Viecadmiral Alexei Shepap ...
author: Army Inform
